ComicInfo.Summary: If you like big, slimy, scaly, teeth-gnashing, tail-thrashing, building-smashing beasties in your comic books, then this is your dream-come-true! Featuring stories and art from creators like Tim Truman (Scout) along with his son Ben, Mike Wolfer, and Chris Warner (Terminator), Brian Buniak (Mr. Monster), and many others! This is the monster extravaganza of the decade!
ComicInfo.Title: Jungle of the Giants!; Burn Out; Desperate; Monster Island
